sentences.sentence: The value of India increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease greatly by 2012; while China, Dutch and Britain decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012.

sentences.sentence: The value of India increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease greatly by 2012; while China, Dutch and Britain decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012.
